sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Home Grown Business Opportunity Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Home Grown Business Opportunity Act.

sections.heading: Purpose. The purpose of this Act is to establish resources for businesses and municipalities located geographically close to bordering states, so that those businesses and municipalities can identify existing State services and resources to help them be more competitive with bordering states
